body_text:
What is this OVA with a girl in red with a massive collar that lifts a massive sword? I read a review about this OVA series about 5 years ago, but it might've been older.
Here's what I remember:
A girl in red with a massive collar is found and taken into a guy's harem. She is made to strip. There is something about an enemy nation and a shipwreck, and there is a massive sword no-one can lift, but then she manages to lift it.

What anime is this picture of a horse pulling on a white-haired girl’s stocking from? Found this pic but have no clue as to what anime it is from. Please help.  
Note: this is all I have.
